hotels.title: Swiss Alps Serene Mountain Luxury with Thermal Spa & Two-Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Escape to the Swiss Alps at 7132 Hotel, an architectural masterpiece part of the prestigious Preferred Hotels and Resorts group. The crown jewel of the resort is the ultra-luxurious thermal spa designed by Peter Zumthor, crafted using 60,000 slabs of local quartzite. When you're not swimming in the 30-degree indoor or outdoor pool or taking healing dips in the fire and ice pools, journey into fine dining at the two-Michelin-starred 7132 Silver restaurant, where Chef Mitja Birlo has curated a menu that celebrates local produce. The hotel enjoys a jaw-dropping location amid the dramatic alpine scenery of the Graub√ºnden canton bordering Italy, Austria, and Switzerland. Thanks to 7132's thoughtful design, enjoy views of the majestic mountain range from almost every point thanks to an abundance of floor-to-ceiling windows and mountain-facing terraces.
